name: DotNet App Starter Kit
tagline: Code common to a lot of DotNet apps that gets re-written all the time, such as wrapping logging and caching with interfaces to enable unit testing - gets you up and going with a DotNet app quicker by providing interfaces and default implementations for these components
body:
### Welcome to DotNet App Starter Kit.
Code common to a lot of DotNet apps that gets re-written all the time, such as wrapping logging and caching with interfaces to enable unit testing - gets you up and going with a DotNet app quicker by providing interfaces and default implementations for these components.


### Author:
[www.nootn.com.au](http://www.nootn.com.au)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
